name: Capability Hub Bridge
description: Dynamically discovers and bridges tools from a Capability-Hub instance, enabling OpenClaw agents to use external capabilities like Twitter, GitHub, Slack, and more.

authToken.description: Authentication token for Capability-Hub API. Will be sent as Bearer token in Authorization header.

tags.description: Only discover tools with these tags (e.g., ["twitter", "social-media"])

timeout.description: Default timeout in milliseconds for tool invocations (default: 15000)

enabled.description: Enable local caching of discovered tools (default: false)
